PARAMETER.NAME: NOTE_HADOOP_CONF
PARAMETER.DEFAULT: The hadoop configuration files must be packaged in a jar file. Please read the documentation for more details.

PARAMETER.NAME: LIBRARY
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (SPARK_MODE=='YARN_CLIENT' AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='HORTONWORKS' AND SPARK_VERSION=='HDP_21') OR (DISTRIBUTION=='MAPR' AND SPARK_VERSION=='MAPR_401')))

IMPORT.NAME: spark-assembly-1.0.0-cdh5.1.2-hadoop2.3.0-cdh5.1.2.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: SPARK_MODE=='LOCAL' OR (SPARK_MODE=='CLUSTER' AND DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA' AND SPARK_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH51')
